title: Bug 5340 - Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog does not close immediately. Instead, it stays open even after cancelling the operation.
EB: The progress dialog closes immediately after cancelling the add exception breakpoint operation.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1) Open the debugger.
2) Go to the breakpoints menu.
3) Try to add an exception breakpoint.
4) Immediately cancel the operation.
5) Observe that the progress dialog closes and the exception breakpoint is not added.
